aboutme.title: Get to
aboutme.subtitle: Â¡Hello! My name is Ramiro Gumma and I'm Frontend Developer.
aboutme.paragraph: I live in Buenos Aires, Argentina and I'm a freelancer. I am certified in Workana and Linkedin and my current activity is mainly focused on HTML, CSS and Javascript; I also use React, Node.js, Redux, Next,js, Firebase, Sql, WebSockets, Tailwind and Bootstrap technologies. I adapt to agile management methodologies that provide a fast and effective solution to your company's problems. I am very meticulous and seek perfection and that my client always has priority and a superior product.
aboutme.paragraph2: I have discovered my passion for this digital world, essential to advance in a super competitive market; and that is why I am in continuous training, developing my potential permanently

contactme.title: Contact me
contactme.subtitle: I'll be glad to answer your questions.
